mapper.insert:

id,
dprtcode,
dh,
zgxq,

whsj,

whrid,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dprtcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zgxq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{zgzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{xfyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xffjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{fkrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{zgsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zgfjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{shfjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gbyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{gbfjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sysdate,
#{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select b.id,b.dprtcode,b.dh,b.zgxq,b.zgzt,b.zrbmid,b.zt,b.xfrid,b.xfsj,b.xfyy,b.xffjid, b.fkrid,b.fksj,b.zgsm,b.zgfjid, b.shrid,b.shsm,b.shsj,b.shfjid,b.gbrid,b.gbyy,b.gbsj,b.gbfjid,b.whsj,b.whbmid,b.whrid, t1.username ||' '|| t1.realname as xfrname, t2.username ||' '||t2.realname as fkrname, t3.username ||' '||t3.realname as shrname, t4.username ||' '||t4.realname as gbrname, t5.username ||' '||t5.realname as whrname, t6.dprtname as zrbmname, t7.dprtname as whbmname from b_z_002 b left join t_user t1 on b.xfrid =t1.id left join t_user t2 on b.fkrid = t2.id left join t_user t3 on b.shrid = t3.id left join t_user t4 on b.gbrid = t4.id left join t_user t5 on b.whrid = t5.id left join t_department t6 on t6.id=b.zrbmid left join t_department t7 on t7.id=b.whbmid where b.id=#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update b_z_002
zgxq=#{zgxq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zgzt=#{zgzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zrbmid=#{zrbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zt=#{zt,jdbcType=INTEGER},
xfrid=#{xfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xfsj=sysdate,
xfyy=#{xfyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xffjid=#{xffjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fkrid=#{fkrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fksj=sysdate,
zgsm=#{zgsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zgfjid=#{zgfjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shrid=#{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shsm=#{shsm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shsj=sysdate,
shfjid=#{shfjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gbrid=#{gbrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gbyy=#{gbyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gbsj=sysdate,
gbfjid=#{gbfjid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whsj=sysdate,
whbmid=#{whbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
whrid=#{whrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
